original_title: Winners of FriMi’s staycation promotion gear up for getaway
original_body_lines: FriMi’s exclusive debit card staycation promotion came to an end recently in Colombo, when two top spending lucky FriMians Tharindu Tennakoon and Nazeemdeen Nishad received their vouchers for a getaway for two at Citrus Waskaduwa.

The winners secured their top spot by being among the highest FriMi spenders during the promotion period which ran until 28th February 2023. As a reward, a bright and sunny vacation awaits them along Sri Lanka’s West Coast.

Promotions such as these are a reflection of FriMi’s commitment to reward its loyal FriMians with the most sought-after and effortless rewards all year round, making it the must-have debit card to unlock a world of perks and benefits.
